author: Kathy Clewett
text:
We are in the process of better mapping our stated responsibilities and jobs to what it really costs to provide the service. We are trying to look at this city wide ie: all departments.
Has anyone done an in-depth job mapping process? 
If you have, are there forms you used or on-line surveys?
Has anyone had success with outsourcing finance department functions, besides billing?
Thank you for any in-sight.
We are looking for responses before August 1, 2012
title: Job mapping
